p: Data were expressed as means and pooled standard error of the mean. The normality of the data and homogeneity of variance were tested using the Shapiro-Wilk and Brown-Forsythe tests, respectively. Data were analyzed using one-way analysis of variance in the general linear model of Statistica (Statistica 10.0 software, StatSoft, Krak√≥w, Poland) with treatment (diet) as a fixed effect.
